Params: {3: 'Yellow sand drifts across the distant ruins.'}
{3: 'Under the harsh, blinding sun, Nanami sits beside a broken-down Vassago, tinkering with her wheels.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Sand just loves getting stuck in these wheels... No matter how good the oil is, they always end up feeling cranky...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'It was all snow just a moment ago. Why did it suddenly turn into a desert?', 3: '8'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami knows why! It's because extreme weather conditions are all over the world now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She shakes her legs with a frown.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "We're running simulations in the same space-time coordinates, but sometimes time shifts suddenly... just like what happened earlier.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Time rushes past them like a whirlwind of snow and sand, and in the blink of an eye, bitter cold transforms into scorching heat.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami has never... seen any humans in this kind of world.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami doesn't know what happened... and can't find the reason why.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's why I don't like this world.", 4: '1'}
{3: "When she's done applying fresh oil to her wheels, Nanami suddenly springs up from the sandy ground and rushes to over to bear you a big hug."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "With you here, Commandant, there's nothing to be afraid of!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "There's no info here, so let's head to the next spot!", 4: '1'}
